xs.$description: 0.5rem - Extra small spacing - tight gaps, compact layouts (p-2, m-2, gap-2)

sm.$description: 1rem - Small spacing - component padding, small gaps (p-4, m-4, gap-4)

md.$description: 1.5rem - Medium spacing - default gaps, card padding (p-6, m-6, gap-6)

lg.$description: 2rem - Large spacing - section padding, generous gaps (p-8, m-8, gap-8)

xl.$description: 3rem - Extra large spacing - major sections, page padding (p-12, m-12, gap-12)

2xl.$description: 4rem - 2X large spacing - page sections, large containers (p-16, m-16, gap-16)

3xl.$description: 6rem - 3X large spacing - hero sections, major layout gaps (p-24, m-24, gap-24)

max-width.$description: Maximum content width for main containers

$note: This 8px-based scale (p-2, p-4, p-6, p-8, p-12, p-16, p-24) is recommended for consistency, but the full Tailwind spacing scale (p-1, p-3, p-5, etc.) is also acceptable. Avoid arbitrary values like p-[13px].
